- Pressure + surface wind maps
- IWV with ITCZ edges and center (with uncertainties)
- Some measure of expected deep convection: Precipitation / CAPE /vertical velocity / forecasted satellite images
- Special interests (dust, cloud fraction, ...)

yellow:  1 day lead forecast
orange:  2 days lead forecast
red:     3 days lead forecast
